decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): SITE LOCATION PLAN; ALTO ENERGY SAMSUNG EHS MONO HTQ; 220904 (SECTION AND ELEVATION, DATED 04/09/2023); 220904 (PLANS, DATED 04/09/2023); ACOUSTIC ASSESSMENT (230719-R001A) (DATED 15/09/2023) (REV A); SOUND COVER SHEET 1 AND 2.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| The Air Source Heat Pump hereby approved shall be the make, model and specification shown in the submitted ALTO ENERGY SAMSUNG EHS MONO HTQ document.
Reason: To control noise and vibration transmission and safeguard the amenity of neighbours in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).

| Prior to first use of the Air Source Heat Pump, the sound cover and sound barrier hereby approved shall be installed as per the ACOUSTIC ASSESSMENT (230719-R001A) (DATED 15/09/2023) (REV A) document. The performance of the sound cover and sound barrier shall meet the criteria set out in the document and be permanently retained and maintained thereafter.
Reason: To control noise and vibration transmission and safeguard the amenity of neighbours in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Installation of air source heat pump unit and sound barrier in front garden; and construction of bike store in front garden
